Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2018 05:32AM - edited Jun 19, 2018 05:56AM by jannellg Just found this thread. I had my RB Mx on 5/24/18. Had LB Mx in 2012. This time seems harder for some reason. Re: Gabapentin. I am taking it along with perocet. I was not prescribed Gab in 2012. I can tell a big difference in my comfort level, especially for night time. Uh...and it doesn’t make you “high”. If you look it up, it’s indicated for sleep. Not sure how “high” you are while you’re sleeping. And it is indicated for nerve pain...soooo...not sure the problem with your Dr
